nodes.text: A tribe of Trandoshans was led by Warlord Vurrsk on Nameel. The tribe attempted to buy outlawed weapons from a group of Dupei monks, who proceeded to steal credits from them. When the Trandoshans attacked the Dupei in retaliation, the Jedi Eno Cordova and Cere Junda were sent to restore peace. Padawan Junda accidentally provoked and insulted the tribe, believing the Dupei monks to be innocent, but Cordova discovered the truth.
